subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After six games, Fred Robbins, a hulking 317-pound defensive tackle,  is tied with two other Giants for the team lead in interceptions, to go along with his 17 tackles and three and a half sacks.
snippet: After six games, Fred Robbins, a hulking 317-pound defensive tackle,  is tied with two other Giants for the team lead in interceptions, to go along with his 17 tackles and three and a half sacks.
